# echoverse: echoconda 

Various utility functions to find, build, and use conda environments from within R.
 
```{r, eval=FALSE}
if(!"remotes" %in% rownames(installed.packages())){install.packages("remotes")}

remotes::install_github("RajLabMSSM/echoconda")
library(echoconda)
```
